title: Baby Legs
description: Baby Legs is a good detective, but not good enough because of his baby legs. So his chief is partnering him up with Regular Legs.
quote: This is upsetting to me because I feel like I don’t need no regular-leg partner.
altHero: a gun-wielding detective has baby legs (diaper and all) and has difficulty walking
alt1: a police chief speaks to a shorter detective
alt2: another detective, Regular Legs, crouches to speak to Baby Legs
alt3: a rough looking man in a warehouse carries a box labeled “Not drugs”
alt4: Regular Legs has the criminal on the ground and Baby Legs looks pleased
